Sen. John McCain ( R - Ariz . ) called on [ARG0: the Trump administration] to [V: rescind] [ARG1: its " zero - tolerance " border policy] [ARGM-LOC: at the U.S. southern border] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] , calling the policy separating families " an affront to the decency of the American people . "

Sen. John McCain ( R - Ariz . ) called on the Trump administration to rescind its " zero - tolerance " border policy at the U.S. southern border on Monday , calling [ARG0: the policy] [V: separating] [ARG1: families] " an affront to the decency of the American people . "
